name: the one where Ricardo tries to register a new owner using the Web form with an existing owner
scenarioId: classpath:features/owners/owners_registration:the one where Ricardo tries to register a new owner using the Web form with an existing owner
methodName: the one where Ricardo tries to register a new owner using the Web form with an existing owner

testSteps.description:
Given Kelly has already registered an owner with the following information
| firstName | lastName | address | city | phone |
| Josh | Long | prinsengracht 263 | Amsterdam | 0687234567 |

children.description: Kelly registers a new Owner using the API
Kelly executes a POST on the resource /owners

testSteps.description: And Ricardo wants to register a new owner using the web application

children.description: Ricardo navigates to the owner registration page
Ricardo clicks on the Owners menu
Ricardo clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When He fills the registration form with the same data used by Kelly

children.description: Ricardo registers a new Owner using the web form
Ricardo enters 'Josh' into the 'firstName' input field
Ricardo enters 'Long' into the 'lastName' input field
Ricardo enters 'prinsengracht 263' into the 'address' input field
Ricardo enters 'Amsterdam' into the 'city' input field
Ricardo enters '0687234567' into the 'telephone' input field
Ricardo clicks on the Submit button

testSteps.description: Then he should see an alert containing the following error

reportData.title: Expected alert message
reportData.contents:
Bad Request
An owner with the same personal information already exists

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the content of visible alert should contain all the invalid fields

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to register a pet owner in the system
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to register a pet owner in the system
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to register a new owner in the system
  In order to handle all the pets and visits made by him

title: the one where Ricardo tries to register a new owner using the Web form with an existing owner

rule.name: The system should not allow to register an owner with same personal information of an existing owner
